id.description: Unique identifier for the user. It is a positive integer that is automatically assigned to each user upon registration.

name.description: Full name of the user. It should include the first name, middle name (if any), and last name, separated by spaces. The name should not exceed 100 characters.

email.description: Email address of the user. It should be a valid email address, following the format username@domain.tld. The email address is used for authentication and communication purposes.

birthdate.description: Birthdate of the user in the format YYYY-MM-DD. The birthdate is used for calculating the user's age and displaying personalized content.

isActive.description: Indicates whether the user is active or not. An active user can access the application and perform actions, while an inactive user's access is restricted.
